synopsis.text: Twelve years ago, a cataclysmic event involving two giant mecha robots left the Kingdom of Rimgarde in ruins. In present day, sisters Yui and Rena live a peaceful life in the Enastria Empire, unaware of Rena's true robotic identity as the mecha Magna Alecto. When Rena is approached about uncovering the truth behind the past, she soon becomes embroiled in a clash with a mysterious mecha attacker. Yui rushes to her rescue, driven by their unbreakable sisterly bond. As Rena's secrets come to light, including her ability to transform into the powerful mecha Regalia, threats arise seeking to abuse her power for their own ends. Empress Yui must secure Enastria's safety amidst the looming shadow of Rimgarde's prior devastation, while also protecting her beloved sister Rena. Their sisterly bond is put to the test as the two girls fight not just for themselves but for the fate of the world. Past and present intertwine as forgotten history resurfaces, forcing Yui and Rena to navigate a complex web of international tensions, mysterious mecha technology, and godly resurrection.
